cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: We’re excited to share new resources designed specifically for software architects, project managers, and team leads working with Xperience by Kentico.
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: New Architecture training resources: Plan, build, and upgrade with confidence
cms.contentitemcommondata.ContentItemCommonDataVisualBuilderWidget: {"editableAreas":[{"identifier":"main","sections":[{"identifier":"a70c4763-2a11-4a11-a0a0-9972db072d07","type":"CommunityPortal.SingleColumnSection","properties":{"layout":"Standard","layoutParsed":0,"paddingTop":"Large","paddingTopParsed":0,"paddingBottom":"Large","paddingBottomParsed":0,"backgroundColor":"White","backgroundColorParsed":1},"zones":[{"identifier":"24059699-c7f3-454b-982d-0c76e5ec54eb","widgets":[{"identifier":"3e3da95a-0bc6-4e6e-a80f-807c0e9b5f67","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"a6daad37-cc7b-4d00-a0bd-f3d1d942764e","properties":{"markdown":"We’re excited to share new resources designed specifically for software architects, project managers, and team leads working with Xperience by Kentico. These guides are crafted to focus on analysis and planning, offering high-level insights into building, organizing, and migrating Kentico projects. Whether you’re kicking off a new project or navigating an upgrade from Kentico Xperience 13, these materials will provide the guidance you need to prepare your team and solution for success. Here’s what we have put together for you:","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"065f4a54-1755-4234-9047-c4c9a71e14a4"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"ff14e212-c70e-4065-a9cf-c41f8d83e284","markdownStyle":"d21eca1f-26d2-464d-80b6-f598d138b20f","markdownStyleParsed":"982ca8f7-f319-40c2-b400-b051227784cc","markdownCodeLanguage":"274f2688-2738-4280-8c63-4fab72075e53","id":"e20ec288-5d42-4b3c-9bc8-f2079407ccf9"}}]},{"identifier":"44af6730-4f1e-4921-85ab-275f84467674","type":"CommunityPortal.HeadingWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"472765aa-ad41-486f-b418-f9db8f4c13ab","properties":{"headingText":"Xperience implementation handbook","headingLevel":"H3","headingLevelsParsed":2,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"1b230935-21cd-45aa-9ac7-2167f42c245b"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"32f46151-5e08-4da7-ab3d-b87d768da9c7","headingLevel":"25ab12c2-f6f9-4dea-b996-bcaaab80b679","headingLevelsParsed":"804e6295-35b4-4c5b-a90b-421c9ed6544f","headingAlignment":"e881a8e8-8232-4da7-98d2-13f1160502cf","headingAlignmentsParsed":"1194aefc-9d05-411a-98a8-641edfde373a","showHeadingAnchor":"af2b97eb-834e-4a0d-9f35-7551897b889e","id":"692966cb-0ddc-4b94-8160-6d8ac384d8ef"}}]},{"identifier":"a494c7ce-d1c1-4d9b-8205-b39bc1c03959","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"be060968-b4d3-4453-bed2-3b310e1b2072","properties":{"markdown":"We have updated the materials formerly hosted on [advantage.kentico.com](https://advantage.kentico.com), to reflect the latest best practices for Xperience by Kentico. It provides a comprehensive roadmap that covers every phase of your project, including **gathering requirements, planning, development, testing, deployment, and maintenance.** Whether you’re laying the groundwork for a new implementation or optimizing an existing one, this guide series ensures you’re equipped with the insights to make informed decisions. [Explore the handbook](https://docs.kentico.com/guides/architecture/xperience-implementation-handbook \"https://docs.kentico.com/guides/architecture/xperience-implementation-handbook\").","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"22255b60-86fe-4689-a2e6-0524c34a8316"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"d5483b16-06f5-4e81-bb01-3b85cc45fba8","markdownStyle":"51ded918-d4e7-4075-ba65-9eb271254d30","markdownStyleParsed":"b7937699-eb27-4ec9-a659-18a652906cf3","markdownCodeLanguage":"a18cba14-4d1e-4ced-8613-58175eb3fc72","id":"9441bc2a-5e53-463d-bfd8-010b8cc6e96c"}}]},{"identifier":"f52eacc7-a08e-4dce-b878-e3417d6c02ef","type":"CommunityPortal.HeadingWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"59ee0ba0-155b-4160-9cbf-63c2f2ab53a1","properties":{"headingText":"KX13 to Xperience by Kentico upgrade guides","headingLevel":"H3","headingLevelsParsed":2,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"2a525151-1d27-4a8b-8a15-9c9bdafccdfc"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"f1145216-fcab-4a32-990f-359def796286","headingLevel":"54b1619e-9a80-4b5a-a4db-42ab18918a73","headingLevelsParsed":"60a47ce0-3646-4575-8e13-57b951322aba","headingAlignment":"77c10f5d-78e7-49e3-8b19-2e030267d4dd","headingAlignmentsParsed":"18a5afb9-a7ee-4f94-a478-c0ca0b24c66a","showHeadingAnchor":"74a0a007-2183-433d-95e0-130870d82002","id":"6d609a92-7416-4a9e-98b4-bdd5afc41d63"}}]},{"identifier":"9b1a4b62-da91-4f3e-96ac-30ac63c6ec76","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"0ec0c4e3-72ff-469c-a0d2-c1a5763b8a56","properties":{"markdown":"If transitioning from Kentico Xperience 13 to Xperience by Kentico seems challenging to you, our **migration guides** are here to help. These resources are designed to shed light on the upgrade process, supplementing the documentation with practical insights. They’ll help you understand what migration entails and how to plan for it effectively, offering strategic guidance to identify challenges and estimate efforts based on your solution's features. We’ll also continue expanding these guides based on your feedback to ensure they meet your needs. [Start exploring the migration guides](https://docs.kentico.com/guides/architecture/migrate-from-kx13).","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"409c6374-a2a6-443c-9464-1994d34fe13c"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"dd191212-7160-4068-bc7d-ce280a53136d","markdownStyle":"e87e3aff-9cb6-4679-b170-ff2fb48235b8","markdownStyleParsed":"97ec8781-ebaf-46d8-8536-1fb14dc892e8","markdownCodeLanguage":"392d2e42-c63c-447e-9d27-54d25a2e201b","id":"6c28a44f-bd53-4278-a295-446ca21188d4"}}]},{"identifier":"ab7e5e4b-638a-4bbc-a149-eff41c18d4b3","type":"CommunityPortal.HeadingWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"80f11d78-c84e-43e1-8633-0de3c7db6835","properties":{"headingText":"Content modeling guides","headingLevel":"H3","headingLevelsParsed":2,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"432a02ff-bd94-4c97-82a4-e04d18a05ef9"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"d817e2d5-342e-4357-91ea-3d0ad04f8cb1","headingLevel":"9a4794b6-a578-413a-bfc3-b8606a9b634a","headingLevelsParsed":"7e831fc2-bb3c-4e03-b05b-7baddf55ba96","headingAlignment":"b3511b02-f3a7-459e-824d-d369a8b43006","headingAlignmentsParsed":"695529a8-3c3d-448b-9dfd-e4ec4fb55c01","showHeadingAnchor":"bd370744-29d4-4110-a9e0-5e281e08c3a1","id":"9525d242-e240-4eec-89a6-3dde90608144"}}]},{"identifier":"94af94a6-e8cf-4fa6-bab7-41a880907304","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"4ee6136d-e206-4ea5-ad7e-90a2eb6f2612","properties":{"markdown":"Creating a well-structured content model is essential for successful project delivery, and our content modeling guides are here to help. These **example-driven materials** provide a hands-on introduction to content modeling, covering the essentials of structuring and organizing your content. You’ll learn about the different content types supported in Xperience and discover strategies to create a model that fits your project’s unique needs. [Check out the content modeling guides](https://docs.kentico.com/guides/architecture/content-modeling).","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"a42b809c-3852-4e81-9d76-683a83b3fbfa"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"f7844983-72ed-457b-a943-70126d533a6c","markdownStyle":"92e690a5-99b9-41b3-a1f4-dec97efae162","markdownStyleParsed":"bfa8f30e-8a5a-4a21-abf4-b8627336e268","markdownCodeLanguage":"de21a121-9ca9-49b0-b040-19d54b83d9d7","id":"e5aaf4db-9e30-4320-86a4-37d7032c8f80"}}]},{"identifier":"4218d0b9-5f2b-4d2c-9602-06511712911a","type":"CommunityPortal.HeadingWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"ca353725-dabb-41da-b8dd-447867e20222","properties":{"headingText":"Got Ideas? Dive in today and let us know what other materials you’d like to see next!","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"611c876e-ce2f-424e-9a70-50481de9c8b2"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"8f36d49c-0b87-4426-be5d-6b01c447387b","markdownStyle":"f3ce5edd-cbcb-438a-8c33-ae998fb6a136","markdownStyleParsed":"7a933e6c-f604-4910-b53a-099bab1bdb06","markdownCodeLanguage":"0982f267-298c-413a-8b06-278b0faf3e05","id":"0ca63c0c-a806-4dfe-bf5c-cfc9751c86d7"}}]}]}],"fieldIdentifiers":{"layout":"c91ec12d-972f-4a62-a7c9-1809f5f30225","layoutParsed":"1ab91132-51c8-4cf2-9b06-25b5625b819a","paddingTop":"ba8a951c-0664-4146-98c2-0e20fb7100cc","paddingTopParsed":"6bbbb782-be5d-414d-b66a-428016c28f16","paddingBottom":"210d2203-b973-4530-8413-863daf65f46f","paddingBottomParsed":"3be755ea-1527-4b40-b0a5-1ab784fa3eaa","backgroundColor":"80c4c2c5-24f3-4b3a-9bf8-880b46727775","backgroundColorParsed":"1b8c1add-5481-474b-bb18-e8bf8f6358db"}}]}]}
